list_definition.definition: a person who looks after sick or injured people in hospital
a person, usually a woman, who looks after small children

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The children have gone out with their nurse.

list_definition.definition: to look after sick or injured people, especially in a hospital

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was nursed back to health.

list_definition.definition: to give (a baby) milk from the breast.
to have or encourage (feelings eg of anger or hope) in oneself

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She nursed a faint hope that he would mend his ways.
